metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13818 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Twig before 2.4.4 allows Server-Side Template Injection(SSTI) via the search search_key parameter. NOTE: the vendor points outthat Twig itself is not a web application and states that it is theresponsibility of web applications using Twig to properly wrap input to it.

criterions.comment: twig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
